title: 24L01  Application of Secs 13(a)(2) and 7(i).
text:
The possibility of exemption under Sec
13(a)(2) or Sec 7(i) for employees of certain such establishments should not be
overlooked .
html: The possibility of exemption under Sec 13(a)(2) or Sec 7(i) for employees of certain such establishments should not be overlooked .
